title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, allowing easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, works in Node.js and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that adds Ollama chat and embedding models as first-class citizens inside LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model support, code highlighting, and RAG.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom integration exposing Ollama models as conversation agents for local smart-home assistants.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build RAG pipelines with Ollama, ChromaDB, and LangChain for private document Q&A.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for local code completion.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selectors and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin coroutines support and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama’s REST API with async HTTP client and native JSON mapping.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with Tokio and serde support.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama for private LLM demos with session memory.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-powered summarization, translation, and text generation inside notes.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama functions to AI agents like Claude Desktop for tool use.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Qt6 and C++ for low-resource local chatting.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to declaratively manage Ollama models and configuration on remote hosts.
